channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 名人、运动员和科学家都说，"葡萄糖女神法 "能帮助他们思维更清晰、精力更充沛、欲望更低。但其中的一些指导意见却饱受争议。
item.description:
Celebrities, athletes and scientists say the Glucose Goddess Method helps them think more clearly, have more energy and reduce cravings. But some of its guidance is controversial. https://t.co/GA8lNwu9jehttps://t.co/GA8lNwu9je

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.description:

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.title: 航空公司正在推出一系列飞往弗吉尼亚州诺福克和墨西哥图卢姆等地的新航线。这可能会让您享受到更便宜的机票。
item.description:
Carriers are introducing a slew of new routes to places like Norfolk, Va., and Tulum, Mexico. It could be your ticket to a cheaper flight. https://t.co/lxSs1Aych4 https://t.co/lxSs1Aych4

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.title: 像 Bookstagram 这样的在线书友会正在促成面对面的友谊。"我绝对没有想到它会发展成现在这样的友谊"。
item.description:
Online book clubs like Bookstagram are leading to in-person friendships. “I definitely didn’t see it turning into the friendships that it has.” https://t.co/yEuYAA9sda pic.twitter.com/DuacsU7TzX

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.title: "我童年所有梦想和噩梦的可怕融合"@JasonGay 解决了美国职业棒球大联盟 2024 年春训的意外危机：球员对透视制服的抱怨。
item.description:
“A terrifying fusion of all my childhood dreams and nightmares.” @JasonGay tackles the unexpected crisis of Major League Baseball’s Spring Training 2024: player complaints about see-through uniforms. https://t.co/LwqDrYp2ND https://t.co/LwqDrYp2ND

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.title: 阿伦-杜德尼克从 18 岁起就开始与俄罗斯人作战。华尔街日报》的 @marson_jr 当时就见过他，最近又与他重逢。
item.description:

item.title: 拜登总统说，加沙的战斗最早可能在本周末停止。"我希望下周一就能实现停火"
item.description:
President Biden said that fighting in Gaza could stop as early as this coming weekend. “My hope is by next Monday we’ll have a cease-fire.” https://t.co/OrHGIlvv3A https://t.co/OrHGIlvv3A

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.title: 当之无愧的好莱坞最佳着装奖得主不是瑞恩-高斯林（Ryan Gosling），也不是杰里米-艾伦-怀特（Jeremy Allen White）。而是马蒂-马西森（Matty Matheson），这位从纹身到指甲的厨师变成了明星。
item.description:
It’s not Ryan Gosling or Jeremy Allen White who deserves the title of best dressed in Hollywood right now. It’s Matty Matheson, the tattooed-to-the-fingernails chef turned star. https://t.co/tnWunkgwUu https://t.co/tnWunkgwUu

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.title: 阿根廷新总统哈维尔-米莱伊非常喜欢他的五只克隆英国獒犬。在米莱伊试图解决世界上最高的通货膨胀率时，这种奇特的关系为反对者提供了素材。
item.description:
Argentina’s new president, Javier Milei, adores his five cloned English mastiffs. The peculiar relationship is providing fodder for opponents as Milei tries to tackle the world’s highest inflation. https://t.co/6veevCu4Vr https://t.co/6veevCu4Vr

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.title: 你们可以分开睡，但不会伤害你们的婚姻。真的

item.title: 2020 年，Netflix 推出了一档约会真人秀节目，该节目的前提非常诱人：两个人能否在从未见过对方的情况下坠入爱河？以下是迅速成为超新星的《爱情盲点》是如何帮助这家流媒体公司建立起一个帝国的。
item.description:
In 2020, Netflix released a reality-dating show with a tantalizing premise: Could two people fall in love without ever seeing each other? Here's how “Love Is Blind,” which quickly went supernova, helped the streamer build an empire. https://t.co/kxXvpM4WPF https://t.co/kxXvpM4WPF

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.title: 10 月 7 日，蕾切尔-戈德堡-波林（Rachel Goldberg-Polin）摇身一变，成为拯救她儿子和其他剩余人质生命的国际努力的倡导者、战略家和代言人。
item.description:

item.title: 人工智能驱动的红利让英伟达的估值达到了 2 万亿美元。这使它成为竞争对手甚至客户的巨大目标，他们都想削弱它的主导地位
item.description:
An AI-driven bonanza has sent Nvidia’s valuation to the $2 trillion stratosphere. That's made it a giant target for rivals and even customers that want to diminish its dominance https://t.co/AyZxx1AFzz https://t.co/AyZxx1AFzz

item.title: 目前还没有预防痴呆症的万无一失的方法，但研究人员正在进一步了解主要由我们控制的因素与认知能力下降之间的联系
